CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 24, 1958, p. A19, reads: "THE PITTSBURGHERS - The smart Pittsburghers Club gave its annual tea Sunday, and for the first time, held it elsewhere than Loendi Club. the North Side Elks was the spot chosen for the sparkling social events. On the program were, left to right: Atty. Leroy Irvis, the principal speaker; chairman Ethel Coy, Leo McTurner, co-chairman Delgratia Allen and Howard Hairston, emcee. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Pittsburghers Club members K. Leroy Irvis, Ethel Coy, Leo McTurner, Delgratia Allen, and Howard Hairston, standing in North Side Elks lodge for their annual tea
